item.source: Need help coding teleports and such

item.title: Need help coding teleports and such
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well if ur talking about a like ::training command, then thats simple!

basically, this is the template (kind of) for delta teleporting commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“nubmining”) && playerRights >= 0) {
toX = 3138;
toY = 9870;

	}

search for customcommand in your client.java, then, add this right under it
now for the changes
were it says nubmining, change that to ur command name (right now, it would be ::nubmining, if you changed that to staffzone, in game command would be ::staffzone)
now the toX and toY
change the numbers to the x and why coordinates you want the tele to go to, your delta should have the ::mypos command, do that, those are your coordinates, replace them with the coordinates ive put in my teleport command, save, compile, reset your server and do the command, and it should work!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help coding teleports and such
